verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: south carolina] [ARGM-ADJ: mass] [V: shooting] [ARG1: a south carolina sheriff deputy who died from wounds suffered in a mass shooting earlier this month] was remembered sunday at her funeral as a dedicated peace officer who always had a smile the funeral for florence county sheriff investigator farrah turner 36 drew relatives and colleagues together along with law enforcement representatives from around the country turner was part of a team that investigated sex crimes against children a job that her boss sheriff kenney boone called one of the hardest on the force florence center katie godwin frederick gowland hopkins florence south carolina investigator florence county sheriffs office sheriff kenney boone sheriff leon lott frederick hopkins farrah turner florence county south carolina officer florence county south carolina florence florence county sheriff office
